text: Ball of Fire is a 1941 American romantic comedy movie directed by Howard Hawks and was based on the short story From A to Z. It stars Gary Cooper, Barbara Stanwyck, Dana Andrews, Henry Travers, Tully Marshall, Aubrey Mather, Allen Jenkins, Kathleen Howard, Mary Field and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1942 and was remade as A Song Is Born by 1948 with Howard Hawks returning as director. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1941 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks
title: Ball of Fire
